name: Menagerie (Sean Smeed Composer, Skyler Zartman, Metatanium, Ana_myer1101)
name_original: Menagerie (Sean Smeed Composer, Skyler Zartman, Metatanium, Ana_myer1101)
description:
Welcome to the Menagerie. We have been waiting for you.

This build is still very much a work in progress, so we wanted to explain a few things that might not be clear/obvious in this build..

Controls

WASD = Move

SHIFT = RUN

TAB + Arrow keys = SING

LEFT CLICK = Interact

RIGHT CLICK = Scroll Dialogue

Graphics

If you have an average computer like me and run into FPS problems, try lowering the graphics setting in the opening menu. UI

There are some problems with the Pocket Score UI in the build we submitted. If you play this game, please make sure to jot these songs down somewhere beforehand! This will of course be fixed later but we can't submit a new build until the game jam is over. 

Songs:

Song of Calming = Up, right, left, down

Song of Grounding = Down, Left, Right Down (edited)

Song of Slowing = Up, Down, Left, Down

Song of Revealing = Left Right Left Up Thank you EVERYONE for checking out our world!  BUGS

The final cutscene doesn't load properly =( however if you get all 8 monsters and let the game run for about 2 minutes after talking to the old man you can experience a kind of cool cursed buggy cutscene before it freezes in place. it is truly creepy.  THANK YOU for visiting our world. We hope you enjoy the experience. 

DirectX 12 Graphics Card required

GTX 1650 recommended for max graphics
